title: Game Stuttering/Skipping Frames
body:
I am playing on a Macbook Pro 2014

2.6 GHz Dual-Core Intel Core i5 Processor (Turbo Boost up to 3.1 GHz, 3 MB shared L3 cache)
8 GB 1600 MHz DDR3L RAM; 128 GB PCIe-based Flash Storage
Intel Iris Graphics

And my game skips frames while my ping and fps are fine. I have changed my FPS cap and turned off predictive movement as well as repaired my client and reinstalled twice. It started right after updating to path 7.8 Any help?

replies.body: Had the same Problem. How I fixed it :  Basicaly a programm called "flux" that i have installed on my PC caused the Problem of Stutter / Frameskip even tho my fps/ms counter was good. Just uninstall Flux or turn on its "safe Mode" if you have it installed on your PC. Maybe this will help someone ;=)
Thanks man you just fixed my problem üòÅ

I'm having the same stuttering issue. i5 4690k, GTX 970, 16 gigs of ram
good system, just started happening this patch too.

I've tried everything on the riot support, nothing has worked thus far.

There could be some setting or processing issues causing these frame drops, and you've taken some solid steps towards fixing that up.  I'm with Rineyy that the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide will have some additional steps to help make sure your in-game experience is tuned up.  Just maek sure to select the Mac options for instructions specific to you.  Test it in a custom and let me know how it goes, or if you run into any errors.

Boost your FPS by utilising the **[Frames for days booster.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)** This booster is legal and is approved by Riot.

http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news/Skins/Tristana_RocketGirl_Splash.jpg

**Once everything from the top article is checked, proceed to the one below. **
